name: AJobWellDone
0:
”Alexa, launch leadership advice”
”Alexa, open leadership advice”
”Alexa, start leadership advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: leadership advice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Join us as we dive into the journeys of successful business leaders to find out what it takes to rise to the top. 

If you seek clarity on choosing the right career, landing a dream job, getting a promotion, or simply being the best at what you do, this is the podcast for you.
NOTE:
As soon as you open/launch the podcast, you will be playing the latest episode by default, but you can always find something more specific. Read HOW TO USE instructions below

HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open ‘leadership advice’”.

Next/Previous:
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

Fast Forward:
If you want to skip ahead, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘leadership advice’ to fast forward 2 minutes"

Rewind:
if you want to go back, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘leadership advice’ to rewind 30 seconds"

Specific Episode:
You can also use ‘Episode No’ to play specific episodes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
